select c.id, c.title, c.cover, c.lesson_num as lessNum,
s1.title as subjectParentTitle, s2.title as subjectTitle,
t.name as teacherName,
convert(c.price,decimal(8,2)) price from edu_course c left join edu_teacher t on c.techer_id = t.id left join edu_subject s1 on c.subject_parent_id = s1.id left join edu_subject s2 on c.subject_id = s2.id where c.id = #{id}

SELECT c.id, c.title, c.cover, CONVERT(c.price, DECIMAL(8,2)) AS price, c.lesson_num AS lessonNum, c.buy_count AS buyCount, c.view_count AS viewCount, cd.description,
t.id AS teacherId, t.name AS teacherName, t.intro, t.avatar,
s1.id AS subjectLevelOneId, s1.title AS subjectLevelOne, s2.id AS subjectLevelTwoId, s2.title AS subjectLevelTwo
FROM edu_course c LEFT JOIN edu_course_description cd ON c.id = cd.id LEFT JOIN edu_teacher t ON c.teacher_id = t.id LEFT JOIN edu_subject s1 ON c.subject_parent_id = s1.id LEFT JOIN edu_subject s2 ON c.subject_id = s2.id WHERE c.id = #{id}
